formElement.documentation: Previously defined configuration for the plugin
formElement.label: Configuration Name:

formElement.documentation: Path to the file, may be either absolute or relative to the job workspace.
formElement.label: File Path:

formElement.documentation: Folder to look for the file if the file name is not determined.
formElement.label: File Folder:

formElement.documentation: Include pattern to look for the file, e.g. \.log$
formElement.label: Include Pattern:

formElement.documentation: Exclude pattern to be used while looking for the file, e.g. \.log$
formElement.label: Exclude Pattern:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the objects will be made public. Not applicable to the buckets with uniform access.
formElement.label: Make Public?:

formElement.documentation: If checked, the existing object will be overwritten.
